divs: Sighting Detailsat approximatly 8:05,just past dusk my wife and i were out front of our house(which faces west).We were playing with two of our grand children,I was pointing out different aircraft in the sky to my grandson,when I looked north high in the sky what looked like a starlike object or very bright light about as bright as venus.It seemed to be coming straight down at us then it just changed course and reversed.But was real strange it looked like some kind of propulsion system that emmited a cone shaped mist propelling it the other way into space.Now as i said before my house faces west I"ve seen rockets launched from vandeberg,this reminded me of a rocket stage separation.But heres were it really gets weird about ten minutes later almost in the same exact spot in the sky it happens again!the same exact way.Now I know the perseid meteor shower peaked last week these were no meteors.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in San Bernardino
There were no other sightings in San Bernardino on or around August 16th 2010
